ABC: Rewarded for acquiring a 1, 2, and 3 card in ascending or decending order.  Required for another combo.  Has 3 Levels.  Gives [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]25[/color] at Lv1, [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]75[/color] at Lv2 and [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color] at LvMAX.
XYZ: Rewarded for acquiring a 4, 5, and 6 card in ascending or decending order.  Required for another combo.  Has 3 Levels.  Gives [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]25[/color] at Lv1, [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]75[/color] at Lv2 and [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color] at LvMAX.
ALPHABET: SECRET COMBO: Rewarded for getting a LvMAX ABC and XYZ combo.  Awards a [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]500[/color] and a [color=red]2x[/color] Score Multiplier.
ODD: Rewarded for acquiring three ODD cards in a row.  Required for another combo.  Has 3 Levels. Gives [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]25[/color] at Lv1, [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]75[/color] at Lv2 and [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color] at LvMAX.
EVEN: Rewarded for acquiring three EVEN cards in a row.  Required for another combo.  Has 3 Levels. Gives [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]25[/color] at Lv1, [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]75[/color] at Lv2 and [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color] at LvMAX.
EVEN THE ODDS: SECRET COMBO: Rewarded for acquiring LvMAX with both EVEN and ODD bonuses.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]500[/color] and a [color=red]2x[/color] Score Multiplier.
SEVENS: Rewarded for acquiring three 7 cards in a row.  Required for another combo.  Has 3 Levels. Gives [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]25[/color] at Lv1, [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]75[/color] at Lv2 and [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color] at LvMAX.
LCK-A: Rewarded for acquiring a TREASURE, BAR,and then another TREASURE card.  Required for another combo.  Has 1 Level.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]100[/color].
LCK-B: Rewarded for acquiring a TREASURE, any NUMBER, and then another TREASURE card.  Required for another combo.  Has 1 Level.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]100[/color].
LUCKY: Rewarded for acquiring both LCK-A and LCK-B LvMax.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]300[/color].
BARTENDER: Rewarded for acquiring three BAR cards in a row.  Has 3 levels.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color] at each level.
OOF: SECRET COMBO: Rewarded for acquiring three BOMB cards in a row.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]150[/color], and please don't do this to yourself again.
BONUS: Rewarded for acquiring an additional SEVENS combo after attaining SEVENS LvMAX and LUCKY LvMAX.  Awards [color=green]$[/color][color=yellow]500[/color].
